product_description: Enhance your home’s scent with Air Wick Scented Oil Refills infused with 100% natural essential oils. Air Wick Scented Oil Refills release continuous fragrance for up to 60 days (based on low setting) so your home smells welcoming. Our latest Air Wick scented oil warmer optimizes airflow for 360 degree fragrance diffusion, reaching every corner of the room for a consistent fragrance experience. The Air Wick Scented Oil warmer also allows you to choose between 5 fragrance settings for just the right amount of fragrance. It continuously diffuses and carefully blends fragrance throughout your home, office, or any space.

name: Febreze Plug-In Air Freshener, Odor-Fighting Scented Oil Starter Kit, Air Fresheners for Home, Bathroom and Kitchen, Long Lasting, Gain Original Scent, Warmer + 4 Refill, Multicolor
short_description: Starter kit includes Febreze Fade Defy PLUG and (4) scented oil refills
Fight household odors with first-day freshness that lasts 50 days on low with digitally controlled scent release
Breathe in the classic fresh fragrance of Gain Original Scent
Low-level indicator light so you know when to refill
Continuous, automatic odor fighting and fresh scent
product_description: From kids' sports gear to your dog's favorite slobbery toy, your home is full of hidden stinks. With a Febreze Fade Defy PLUG Air Freshener starter kit, you can fight odors with a continuous fresh scent. While other pluggable air fresheners fade quickly, the Fade Defy PLUG is true to its name, and keeps its fresh scent for a full 50 days on low. And this scent refill pack comes with four Fade Defy PLUG refill so you can keep that freshness going. When it's time for a refill, the automatic air freshener will let you know with a handy low-level indicator light. Ready to hit refresh in your home and be an A+ odor fighter? Just refill the Febreze Fade Defy PLUG and plug it into any outlet (they'll even rotate if your outlet is upside down) in any high-traffic area of your home... the kitchen, bathroom, or anywhere else odors like to linger. With rich amber, invigorating greens, and sweet florals, the freshness of Gain Original Scent is a treat to your nose, without doing a single load of laundry. Looking for an instant burst of fresh on funky fabrics? Give Febreze Fabric Refresher a try.

name: Febreze Plug-In Air Freshener, Odor-Fighting Scented Oil Starter Kit, Air Fresheners for Home and Bathroom and Kitchen, Long Lasting for Strong Odors, Bamboo Scent, Warmer + 4 Refill
short_description: Contains (1) starter kit and (4) LIGHT scent oil refills for Febreze PLUG with Fade Defy technology
Continuously fights stinks with a light, fresh scent and no heavy perfumes
Fights odors with breezy first-day freshness for 50 days (on low) with digitally controlled scent release
Get lost in a peaceful rainforest with the watery, nature-inspired scent of LIGHT Bamboo
Low-level indicator light feature lets you know when it's time to change out your oil refill
product_description: Looking for a lighter way to freshen up instead of masking odors with heavy scents? Clear the air with a Febreze LIGHT Fade Defy PLUG Air Freshener starter kit and refill, and fight odors with no heavy perfumes. With Fade Defy Plug's digitally controlled scent release, you can say goodbye to stinks with a first-day, no-fade pluggable freshness that lasts 50 days (on low). Just plug the warmer into any outlet in your home, like the kitchen, your bedroom, or the living room. With relaxing scents of watery, green, and floral, LIGHT Bamboo will transport your senses to a magical rainforest. Best of all, the Fade Defy Plug has a low-level indicator light... so you know when to swap in a new Febreze refill.

name: Air Wick Scented Oils 2+0 Advanced Gadget
short_description: Air Wick Advanced Plug-In pulses scent you will notice for up to 60 Days*. With anti-fading technology, boost on demand button, and adjustable frequency settings, you will notice our natural-inspired fragrances from first to last drop. Plus, with low-refill alert, you’ll know when it’s time to replace the refill. * on low setting
ANTI-FADING TECHNOLOGY: that automatically releases subtle pulses of fragrance into the air so our nature-inspired fragrances stay noticeable for up to 60 days on low setting.

FRAGRANCE BOOST ON DEMAND: Instant boost mode is activated through a touch-button located in front of the device. The Boost mode lasts for 45 minutes before coming back to its regular setting. When boost mode is active, the top indicator light and the refill light will illuminate.
LOW-REFILL INDICATOR: The low-refill indicator will turn the refill red when it’s close to being empty.
INDICATOR LIGHT: Provides subtle illumination through refill.
ADJUSTABLE TO YOUR LIKING: Five fragrance settings allow you to adjust the intensity of the scented oil release.
Air Wick Advanced Plug-in is compatible with all current Air Wick Scented Oil refills.

short_description: Includes (3) scented oil refills for Febreze Fade Defy PLUG Air Freshener
Fade Defy Technology delivers a first-day freshness that lasts 50 days (on low)
Fight household odors with an air freshener perfect for bedrooms, kitchens, and hallways
Continuous, automatic air freshener with digitally controlled scent release
product_description: Your home will smell scentastic and smell-free thanks to the Febreze Unstopables PLUG with Fade Defy Technology. It fights odors while filling the air with an intensely bold scent. With its digitally controlled scent release, Febreze Fade Defy technology delivers that freshness you crave for 50 days (on a low setting), so you can ditch the fade and keep on sniffing. Unstopables Fresh takes your senses to airy new heights with the invigorating scent of clean laundry. Just plug the warmer into a high-traffic area of your home, choose your scent intensity, and breathe in the tantalizing freshness of Unstopables all day long. It's a great addition anywhere in the house: We're talking living rooms, bedrooms, and hallways. Not only that, when your refill gets too low, the handy low-level indicator light lets you know when it's time to swap. Want to take that continuous freshness on the road? Grab a Febreze Unstopables CAR Vent Clip and show car odors who's boss.

name: Febreze Plug Scent Booster Starter Kit, Oil Diffuser, Air Freshener Plug in, Continuous Scent Device + 2 Gain Original Refills
short_description: Febreze PLUG Scent Booster Starter Kit comes with Device and 2 Febreze Gain Original refills
With rich amber, invigorating greens, and sweet florals, the freshness of Gain Original Scent is a treat to your nose… without doing a single load of laundry
Boost button delivers 40 minutes of increased Febreze scent intensity
Cord for flexible placement: Set in your kitchen, bathroom, living room... anywhere you want scent control
Simple and sleek design looks beautiful on counters, side tables, open shelving, and more
Compatible with all Febreze plug in refills
product_description: Love Febreze PLUG but wish you had more control over its scent? Now you can get the scent you want where you want it with Febreze Plug Scent Booster. More than a typical wall plug in, this unique oil diffuser provides first-day freshness for 50 days (on low) with more scent control than ever before. With rich amber, invigorating greens, and sweet florals, the freshness of Gain Original Scent is a treat to your nose… without doing a single load of laundry. Control your scent, your way: Adjust scent intensity levels from high to low (and even off when you’re away) based on your preference and space. And when the continuous scent isn’t enough, hit the Boost button for 40 minutes of nose-wowing freshness. Conveniently works with your favorite existing Febreze PLUG refills. This nifty device also comes with a cord so you can place it high, low, anywhere you want it… and make scent a centerpiece, not a wallflower. Plus, the simple and sleek design of this oil warmer air freshener is a perfect match to any décor, whether it’s in your living room, bathroom, or kitchen. Get Febreze PLUG Scent Booster and get more scent, more control, just the way you like it.
